#load libraries
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)

#upload data
spring_start_date <- read_csv("trends_phenology.csv")
city_coordinates <- read_csv("us_coords.csv")%>%
  clean_names()

#clean data
spring_start_date <- spring_start_date%>%
  clean_names()%>%
  na.omit()

# Perform an inner join with the correct syntax
joined_spring_coords <- inner_join(spring_start_date, city_coordinates, by = c("lat", "long"))

#filter city to montgomery county
moco_spring_coords <- joined_spring_coords %>%
  filter(lat == 38.9907, long == 77.0261)

#determine average spring arrival date in past 50 years
sorted_spring_coords <- moco_spring_coords %>%
  arrange(date)

#extract most recent data point (last row)
most_recent <- tail(sorted_spring_coords, 1)

#extract earliest data point (first row)
earliest <- head(sorted_spring_coords, 1)

#compare most recent and earliest data points
comparison <- list(
  most_recent = most_recent,
  earliest = earliest
)

#view comparison
comparison
